description: This program smooths the tessellation of a cortical surface and writes out the mean curvature and area files.

average_iters.title: Averaging Iterations
average_iters.description: Specify number of curvature averaging iterations (default is 10).

smoothing_iters.title: Smoothing Iterations
smoothing_iters.description: Specify number of smoothing iterations (default is 10).

no_write.title: No Write Flag
no_write.description: Disable writing of curvature and area estimates.

curvature_name.title: Curvature File Name
curvature_name.description: Write curvature to a specified file name (default 'curv').

area_name.title: Area File Name
area_name.description: Write area to a specified file name (default 'area').

gaussian_params.title: Gaussian Parameters
gaussian_params.description: Use Gaussian curvature smoothing with specified norm and steps.

snapshot_interval.title: Snapshot Interval
snapshot_interval.description: Write snapshot every specified number of iterations.
